British Framework

We’re regulated by the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority. All client deposits are held in Barclays Bank and are protected – up to £50,000 – by the FSCS

Fast infrastructure

All formats use the latest cloud acceleration and content delivery networks to connect data feeds and enable trade processing.

Premium Experience

First-class technology combine with outstanding customer service to create a premium customer experience.

Accessibility

Practice accounts available for all new customers and we have an ever-expanding, extensive range of tools to aid your training and enhance your skill

Competitive Pricing

We offer PIPs as low as 0.4 and leverage of up to 300:1. No commission trading. Deposits can be as low as £100

What is infifox?

Forex as in industry has a reported over $5 trillion a day turnover, with trading in many locations and exchanges 24 hours a day from Sunday night through to Friday night. Foreign exchange trading enables you to take advantage of rate fluctuations across a wide range of currencies. Forex pricing is based on the price relationship between two currencies, such as GBP/USD. Each such relationship is called a pair. You speculate on whether the price of one country's currency will rise or fall against the currency of another country, and take a position accordingly.

What is trade?

Forex as in industry has a reported over $5 trillion a day turnover, with trading in many locations and exchanges 24 hours a day from Sunday night through to Friday night. Foreign exchange trading enables you to take advantage of rate fluctuations across a wide range of currencies. Forex pricing is based on the price relationship between two currencies, such as GBP/USD. Each such relationship is called a pair. You speculate on whether the price of one country's currency will rise or fall against the currency of another country, and take a position accordingly. About us

Spreads From 0.5 pips - Leverage Up To 300:1 - No Requotes Trade Online 24/5 - Forex. Indices. Commodities. Options  

INFINOX CAPITAL Ltd is a company registered in England and Wales under number 06854853. Registered Ofice: Birchin Court 20 Birchin Lane, London, EC3V 9DU, United Kingdom  

INFINOX is a major provider of online foreign exchange (Forex) trading services, ofering margin FX and commodities trading to individuals and institutional clients worldwide.

support@infinox.com  +44(0)20 3713 4490

NFINOX CAPITAL Ltd Is authorised and regulated by the  Financial Conduct Authority under firm reference number 501057.

disclaimer

Trading Derivatives and FOREX carries a high level of risk to your capital including losing more than your initial expenditure. The efect of leverage is that both gains and losses are magnified . You should only trade Forex if you can afford to carry these risks. The historical financial performance of any underlying instrument is no guarantee or indicator of future performance. Trading Derivatives and FOREX may not be suitable for all investors, so please ensure that you fully understand the risks involved, and seek independent advice if necessary.
